definition: to save/to economize/to do without/to omit/to leave out/province/(archaic) central government department
to inspect/to examine/to be aware/to pay a visit (to one's parents or elders)
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Local secondary education is concentrated in the provincial capitals and some district centers.
sentences.chinese: 当地的中级教育主要集中在省会和其它一些行政中心。

sentences.english: Nanjing, capital of the neighboring Jiangsu province, did so five years ago.
sentences.chinese: 邻省江苏省的省会南京市在五年前就已经实施了。

sentences.english: Chengdu is the capital of Sichuan and is the cultural and industrial center for the agricultural Chengdu Plain.
sentences.chinese: 成都是四川的省会，也是成都平原的文化和工业中心。

sentences.english: Hebei province is briefly named as Ji, with Shijiazhuang as its provincial seat.
sentences.chinese: 河北省简称冀，省会城市是石家庄。

sentences.english: Furong District is located in Changsha, the capital city of Hunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 芙蓉区位于湖南省省会长沙市。

sentences.english: Chihli Qing Dynasty was the first capital of the province.
sentences.chinese: 清代曾为直隶省第一省会。

sentences.english: Shenyang is the capital of Liaoning Province. It's the largest city in the Northeast.
sentences.chinese: 沈阳是辽宁省的省会，它是东北最大年夜的皆会。

sentences.english: Part of Xinji City, Hebei Province in Shijiazhuang, the provincial capital.
sentences.chinese: 辛集市隶属于河北省省会石家庄市。

sentences.english: County Administrative Office is located in Lijiang area, 527 kilometers from the provincial capital Kunming.
sentences.chinese: 地区行署所在地丽江县，距离省会昆明市527公里。

sentences.english: Located in central Gansu Province, Dingxi City West, is the southern gate of the provincial capital Lanzhou.
sentences.chinese: 位于甘肃省中部，定西市西部，是省会兰州的南大门。

sentences.english: Haikou, the capital of Hainan Province, is in the northeast of the island.
sentences.chinese: 海口市是海南省省会，它位于海南岛的东北部。

sentences.english: Kunming is the capital of Yunnan Province, it is called "Spring City".
sentences.chinese: 昆明是云南省的省会，被称为“春城”。

sentences.english: Last month I escorted Marston to Zhengzhou, the capital city of Henan Province on a tour.
sentences.chinese: 上个月，我陪同马斯顿去河南省省会城市郑州去旅行。

sentences.english: A spectacular march in four days brought them within ten miles of the capital, Yunnanfu.
sentences.chinese: 他们在四天急行军后到达距省会云南府十英里处。

sentences.english: Since last year, the provincial capital on the market has entered a new era of overlapping.
sentences.chinese: 去年以来，省会市场上已进入一个新时代的重叠。

sentences.english: Jilin is briefly named as Ji, with Changchun as its provincial seat.
sentences.chinese: 吉林省简称吉，省会城市是长春。

definition: capital city of an autonomous region
subprovincial city (having independent economic status within a province)
municipality, namely: Beijing 北京, Tianjin 天津, Shanghai 上海 and Chongqing 重慶|重庆, the first level administrative subdivision/province level city/also called directly governed city
Shijiazhuang prefecture level city and capital of Hebei Province 河北省[He2 bei3 Sheng3] in north China
Yangtze River Delta/abbr. for 長江三角洲|长江三角洲
Lanzhou prefecture-level city and capital of Gansu province 甘肅|甘肃[Gan1 su4]
Northwest China (Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Ningxia, Xinjiang)
